body.raw:
## Sources

The data used in this chart provides from the following sources:

- Media Cloud
- Genios
- Nexis
- DeReKo (Deutsches Referenzkorpus)

## Data processing

The data used in this chart is processed as follows:

- The data is filtered to only include protest events that occurred in the selected time period.
- The data is filtered to only include articles that were mentioned in the protest events.

## Data limitations

There are some limitations to the data used in this chart:

- The data is filtered to only include protest events that occurred in the selected time period.
- The data is filtered to only include articles that were mentioned in the protest events.

## Data licensing

The data used in this chart is licensed under the following terms:

- Media Cloud: Data is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
- Genios: Data is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
- Nexis: Data is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
- DeReKo (Deutsches Referenzkorpus): Data is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
